notes:
Talk of Norway is a collection of Norwegian Parliament speeches from 1998 to 2016. 
Every speech is richly annotated with metadata harvested from different sources, and augmented with language type, sentence, token, lemma, part-of-speech, and morphological feature annotations.
title: Talk of Norway
